@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package com.pixolus.meterreading

The pixometer SDK provides an Android package for reading mechanical and electronic meters as well as barcodes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BarcodeReadingListener
    Implement this interface in your Activity to receive barcode results from a hosted MeterReadingFragment.
    BarcodeReadingViewListener
    Implement this interface in your Activity to receive barcode results from a hosted MeterReadingView.
    CameraListener
    This is the base interface of MeterReadingListener and BarcodeReadingListener.
    CameraViewListener
    This is the base interface of MeterReadingViewListener and BarcodeReadingViewListener.
    MeterReadingListener
    Implement this interface in your Activity to receive meter reading results from a MeterReadingFragment.
    MeterReadingViewListener
    Implement this interface in your Activity to receive meter reading results from a MeterReadingView.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BarcodeReadingResult
    The BarcodeReadingResult represents the value of a scanned barcode plus metadata.
    ContentRegion
    Image region that holds content (i.e. a counter) that was detected by the meter reading fragment.
    Metadata
    The Metadata class is a collection of additional information around a captured meter reading.
    MeterReadingActivity
    Self-contained Activity to perform optical meter reading.
    MeterReadingFragment
    Self-contained Fragment to perform optical meter and barcode reading.
    MeterReadingResult
    The MeterReadingResult represents the value of a scanned counter plus metadata.
    MeterReadingView
    A view to perform optical meter and barcode reading.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BarcodeFormat
    Types of 1d- or 2d-barcode that are available for barcode reading.
    ContentRegion.Location
    Relative location compared to a (potential) second counter.
    Metadata.CaptureType
    Indicates the reason for a capture event (successful OCR, timeout, user-initiated manual capture).
    MeterAppearance
    Types of meters that are supported for automatic reading.
    MeterReadingFragment.CaptureAnimation Deprecated
    Please use MeterReadingView.CaptureAnimation instead.
    MeterReadingResult.Status
    Status description of a reading result.
    MeterReadingView.CaptureAnimation
    Types of animations that are supported to indicate a result has been captured.

Package com.pixolus.meterreading Description

The pixometer SDK provides an Android package for reading mechanical and electronic meters as well as barcodes.

This SDK provides algorithms and user interface parts for reading mechanical and electronic meters as well as barcodes using the camera of an Android device. It is based on cross-platform technology developed by pixolus in C++ that is also available as a native iOS framework.

Using this package, you can integrate the pixometer technology into your own app. Alternatively, you can license the full pixometer app that is built around this package.

Product description and contact form can be found on http://pixometer.io.

Copyright (c) 2015-2017 pixolus GmbH
